title: The conditions regarding maintaining the electrical and fire installations as mentioned above shall be incorporated in the Occupation / Complition Certificate issued by the Authority
clause_text: The conditions regarding maintaining the electrical and fire installations as mentioned above shall be incorporated in the Occupation / Complition Certificate issued by the Authority. The copy of above certificates shall be displayed at some conspicuous place of the building.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The conditions regarding maintaining the electrical and fire installations as mentioned above shall be incorporated in the Occupation / Complition Certificate issued by the Authority.
